channel.title: Jokes
channel.description:
Have you heared any new jokes lately?? if so post them here... must follow RULES
they can be any kind of jokes... NO RACIST JOKES!! (if you post i will ask for you post to be removed and possible action taken againts your account.)

item.title: Jokes
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

Ok heres one.

There is this guy driving his truck when one day he stops at a light. All of a sudden he hears a knock on his window its some blonde girls. “Hi my name is sally and I’d like to tell you your back door is open and your losing half your load.”
He thinks nothing of this rolls up his window and goes to the next light.
Again he hears the knocking and it’s the same girl as if they have never met she says"Hi my name is sally and I’d like to tell you your back door is open and your losing half your load.
Again he rolls up his window and moves on. At the next light he jumps out of his truck and knocks on the blonde’s window. She rolls down the window and he says
"Hi my name is Tom and it’s winter in Wisconsin and I’m driving the salt truck.

Read full topic
